Package app

Class CleanDataRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.CleanDataRepository
public class CleanDataRepository extends Object
Repository class responsible for persisting instances of CleanData into the database using JPA.

This class uses a provided EntityManagerFactory to create EntityManager instances as needed. It performs transactional operations to persist validated sensor data.

Typical usage:


 CleanDataRepository repo = new CleanDataRepository(emf);
 repo.save(cleanData);

It is assumed that the EntityManagerFactory is properly configured and managed outside this class (e.g., in a main application class).

      Parameters:
      cleanData - the validated and standardized data to persist
      Throws:
